<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_journal_field">
    <sys_journal_field action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <element>u_additional_comment</element>
        <element_id>d3a40374c320221052237405e40131f6</element_id>
        <name>u_project_effort</name>
        <sys_created_by>athul</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2025-04-08 15:03:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5973c79dc3f0e25052237405e4013132</sys_id>
        <value>Remarks : 
Project Work : Project Work 
*  Create   dashboard   to display  ci = GRC
* Faced  a issue that already a dashboard existing with same name and same condition
* Started the next story allocate template to particular notification
* Found the notification that met the conditions  
* Changed the email template 
* issue in the demo
* submitting the ritm it skips the approvel in the  existing workflow and it doesnt create any sc task
* need to work in the flow , it does'nt take the value in supervisor variable

Course
* Completed  Ui builder 60 %
* Completed Module 2 
* lab 4 completed 
* Module 3 started 
* reached lab 5</value>
    </sys_journal_field>
</record_update>
